span.span: Due to continuing remote learning, here are options for the next round of picking up school w

ork for your students.
• Thursday, April 9th during the food program pick up from 9am-11am
• Thursday, April 9th from 12:00pm-1:30pm
• Monday, April 13th during the food program pick up from 9am-11am
• Monday, April 13th from 11:00-12:00pm
Pick up will be done from the Middle/High Cafeteria. Please drive in from the south gate to the football field and follow the cones. Stay in your vehicle and staff will bring items to you. If you are unable to pick up necessary items during this time, please contact the District Office to arrange a time. Your student's teachers will let you or your child know if there is work to be picked up. Not all students/grades will have items to be picked up.
We hope you are all staying healthy and safe during this time. If you have any needs, please let us know!
